channel.title: [question] [help] i have a quest
channel.description:
i was wondering if there was away to add how many players on my server to my forums, and have it update it self, like if there was 25 players on it
something on my forums would say player online = 25 and then as soon as someone logs in or out it changes
can i do this? is there a way? if so how
please help
thanks

item.title: [question] [help] i have a quest
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

I doubt anybody would code this for you. I might look into this and make a tutorial…

Read full topic

item.title: [question] [help] i have a quest
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“madbob420, post:4, topic:291704”]rofl,
You have to update it every 10mins.
Thats what everyone does, there is no such thing
as what you have in your first post.[/quote]There’s a possible way to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: [question] [help] i have a quest
item.dc:creator: @madbob420 madbob420
item.description:
@madbob420 wrote:

[center]I also wounder the same question,
I recommend that you do something like what I will show below.

There Are Currently 00 Players On [Server Name Here]
[size=6pt]– Updates Every 10 Minutes –[/size][/center]
